original_title: Goosebumps: It Came from Beneath the Kitchen Sink
overview: When her family moves into a new house, Kat finds a sponge which appears to be alive, but no-one will believe her. After the discovery, the family is besieged by bad luck, and Kat is convinced the sponge is behind it.
tagline: It's warm.. it's breathing.. and it doesn't do dishes!
title: Goosebumps: It Came from Beneath the Kitchen Sink
